snippet: Some credit cards offer cash-back rewards for a 529 college savings account, but the benefit comes only if the balance is paid off every month.
abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column offers Q&A on saving money for college with cash-back credit card.
lead_paragraph: Some credit cards offer cash-back rewards for a 529 college savings account, but the benefit comes only if the balance is paid off every month.

headline.print_headline: Using Credit Card Rewards to Save Money for College
headline.main: Using a Credit Card to Save for College
